panama.core
Class Dispatcher

java.lang.Object
  panama.core.Dispatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.Filter
public class Dispatcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.Filter

The main dispatcher, implemented as a filter.

Author:
Robert

handleRequest

public void handleRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse res)
This is the main dispatching method, handling all requests. It parses request, extracts controller and action information, invokes action and forwards to rendering the template.

onExceptionWhileHandlingAction

public void onExceptionWhileHandlingAction(Context ctx,
                                           java.lang.Throwable throwable)
Callback allowing additional stuff (e.g. rolblack database session) This is called if during handling the action and target an exception is thrown that is not catched anywhere else. The default implementation does nothing.

Parameters:
ctx -
throwable -

getController

public BaseController getController(java.lang.String nameOrAlias)
Creates a new instance for the controller specified by nameOrAlias

Parameters:
nameOrAlias - FQCN or alias of a controller class.
Returns:
Controller object or null

handleAction

protected Target handleAction(Context ctx,
                              java.lang.String path,
                              java.lang.String invocationMode)
                       throws java.io.IOException
Executes action derived from specified path.

Parameters:
ctx - A context
path - A path to an action
invocationMode - One of ACTION_INVOKATION_XXX - During execution, the specified value can be accessed in request context using the ACTION_INVOKATION_MODE_KEY. This may come handy for those who need to know if an action was invoked by an url or programatically
Returns:
The target returned by the action or some error target in case of an error.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
See Also:
handleAction(Context, String)

handleAction

public Target handleAction(Context ctx,
                           java.lang.String path)
                    throws java.io.IOException
Executes action derived from specified path. The path is supposed to look like that: [/.../][/] If no action part can be found, the default action of the controller will be tried.

Parameters:
ctx - A context
path - A path to an action. See description for details.
Returns:
The target returned by the action or some error target in case of an error.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

computeDefaultLocale

protected java.util.Locale computeDefaultLocale(java.util.List<java.lang.String> supported,
                                                java.util.Enumeration accepted)
Finds best fitting locale from supported and accepted locales.

Parameters:
supported - ISO languages codes of locales accepted by the application
accepted - locales accepted by the browser
Returns:
the best fitting locale
